amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part C of House Report 116-51 to increase Air Force Operations and Maintenance by $270 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
